High-End Oven Repair – Precision Repair for the Heart of Your Luxury Kitchen

A luxury oven is more than just an appliance—it’s the foundation of your culinary experience. Whether you're baking, broiling, or roasting with precision, your high-end oven is designed to deliver flawless performance and stunning aesthetics. So when it stops working as it should, you need more than a basic repair—you need expert care.

At Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci, we specialize in high-end oven repair for brands like Wolf, Thermador, La Cornue, Miele, Gaggenau, and Viking. Our factory-trained technicians combine deep brand knowledge with white-glove service to ensure your oven performs perfectly and looks immaculate.

🔧 Why Choose ZARICCI for High-End Oven Repair?

  • ✅ Certified Technicians with Brand-Specific Expertise: Luxury ovens are complex, precision-engineered machines. Our team is trained to service the unique technologies and craftsmanship behind premium brands—so you get repairs that are not only accurate but respectful of your investment.
  • ✅ Genuine OEM Parts Only: We use manufacturer-approved parts to ensure long-lasting results and maintain your appliance’s warranty and performance integrity.
  • ✅ Fast & Flexible Scheduling: We offer same-day and next-day appointments whenever possible, and we arrive on time, every time—because professionalism is part of the experience.
  • ✅ Transparent, Upfront Quotes: No hidden charges. No vague assessments. Just clear pricing and detailed explanations before any work begins.

🛠️ Common High-End Oven Issues We Repair

  • Oven not heating or preheating too slowly
  • Uneven temperature or inconsistent baking
  • Convection fan not working properly
  • Smart oven display glitches or connectivity problems
  • Broken door hinges or damaged gaskets
  • Self-cleaning function failure
  • Control panel or thermostat malfunctions

Whether you're working with a dual-fuel French range or a smart steam oven, we bring your appliance back to life with care and precision.

🔥 Luxury Brands We Service

  • Wolf: Precision temperature control, dual-stacked burners, and convection excellence
  • Thermador: Star Burners™, steam ovens, and smart home integration
  • La Cornue: Château Series craftsmanship and custom configurations
  • Gaggenau: European minimalism with cutting-edge tech
  • Miele: MasterChef programs, touch control systems, and German reliability
  • Viking: Professional-grade features and ultra-fast heat-up times
  • Also servicing: Jenn-Air, Bosch, Dacor, and more

👨‍🔧 Our High-End Oven Repair Process

  • Schedule a Visit: Call or book online. We’ll confirm a convenient appointment and gather a few quick details about your oven.
  • In-Home Diagnosis: A ZARICCI-certified technician arrives promptly, in uniform, and fully prepared to inspect your appliance.
  • Detailed, Upfront Quote: We explain the issue clearly, provide a comprehensive quote, and walk you through your options.
  • Precision Repair with Genuine Parts: We complete the repair using original parts and finish with a full system test to ensure optimal function.
  • Satisfaction Guaranteed: Our work is backed by a warranty, and we leave your home as clean as we found it—if not cleaner.

🌍 Serving Los Angeles & Surrounding High-End Communities

From Beverly Hills, Santa Monica, and Brentwood to Pasadena, Malibu, and West Hollywood, Luxury Appliance Repair by Zaricci is the trusted name for oven repair in the homes of discerning clients who expect nothing but the best.

Repair That Respects Your Oven—and Your Home

We understand that a luxury oven isn’t just a tool—it’s a centerpiece. Our technicians not only fix the issue but preserve the beauty and integrity of your appliance. At ZARICCI, our high-end oven repair service reflects the same excellence your kitchen was built for.
